FuncDef:
The fault-detect filter disable command disables the fault detection filter function on an interface.
The undo fault-detect filter disable command restores the default setting. The fault-detect filter disable command disables the fault detection filter function on an interface. The undo fault-detect filter disable command restores the default setting. By default, the fault detection filter function is enabled on an interface.
